name: Cuboid
description:
Cuboid is a stunning 3D puzzle game in which players navigate ancient ruins and lush environments, maneuvering a rectangular block through mystical exits. Cuboid’s 66 twisted levels will bend your mind with their addictive puzzles, and engage the senses with amazing graphics and soothing music, immersing you in a surrealistic puzzle world. The object is to bring the Cuboid to stand on the exit tile of the game field with as few moves as possible, facing challenges along the way including flimsy tiles, switches and teleports. The Cuboid itself is covered with mysterious glyphs and magical symbols, and completing each level awards players with a piece of a treasure. Cuboid is presented in stunning 1080p and includes trophy support, awarding players with special trophies for achievements such as completing a certain number of levels with minimal number of moves or within a certain time. Then, compare your smooth moves with other players’ scores in the online standings for maximum Cuboid challenge.
